Name: Base Station License, Approval, Vin Jac Corp, Queens
Title: A Local Law in relation to the approval of a determination by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve an application by Vin Jac Corp. also known as Vin Jac Corp doing business as Glen-Belle Car Service for the renewal of a license to operate a base station in the borough of Queens.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

      Section one.  The determination by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve an application by Vin Jac Corp. also known as Vin Jac Corp doing business as Glen-Belle Car Service for the renewal of a license to operate a base station at 264-12 Hillside Avenue in the borough of Queens is hereby approved. 
      ï¿½2. This local law shall take effect immediately. 

LS# 3214
